mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tenant WHERE id IN (SELECT tenant_id FROM tenant_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}) ORDER BY create_date DESC
SELECT tu.*, u.username, u.avater, u.email FROM tenant_user tu LEFT JOIN user u ON tu.user_id = u.id WHERE tu.tenant_id = #{tenantId} ORDER BY tu.join_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tenant_user WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId}

SELECT tu.*, t.name as tenant_name, u.username, u.avater, u.email FROM tenant_user tu LEFT JOIN user u ON tu.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN tenant t ON tu.tenant_id = t.id WHERE tu.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND tu.user_id = #{userId} AND tu.disabled = 0
